sql.name: Tshf_form_sum_number_eomslink
sql.item: select distinct comp.c1 as 流水号, comp.c700000001 as 工单类型, comp.c700000003 as 工单编号, comp.c700000006 as 建单时间, comp.c700000004 as 建单人, comp.c700000011 as 主题, comp.c700000015 as 紧急程度, comp.c700000014 as 所属专业, comp.c700000010 as 工单状态 from {100} comp,{200} city,{300} buss where city.c802800001=comp.c802000010 and buss.c802800003=comp.c802000001 {2}{4}{3}{5}
